alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:49PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Daniels and northwestern Roosevelt Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 448 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bredette, or 21 miles south of Scobey, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bredette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
